mainText:
I was shocked nevertheless to see the message on the homepage even
though it was expected. Somehow, because Steve had wildly succeeded
with a second act at Apple I was also hoping it would be the same with
life. The world has truly lost an amazing person. I have never met him
but he has inspired me, made me more knowledgeable and my life easier,
more creative. For that I thank him from the bottom of my heart. RIP
Steve.
author: Sharon
